ObjectClass.Name: Lancer Micro-Fighter
ObjectClass.Description:
LANCER MICRO-FIGHTER: Light scout and resource harasser aircraft Fast, lightly armored raider
Uses Ammo to fire H.E. splash damage missiles or deploy Caltrop Mines

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 9 (aircraft)\Vision Range: 25, Aggro Radius: 32

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location\More effective with HE Ammo available\[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs]\Gnd: 50 (+50), R 15, SR 1 (+4), Sta C\Air: 40 (+40), R 8, SR 1 (+4), Sta C

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\ \Return to idling or hold fire

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: Teleport to a specified location\or self-teleport within LOS range\Teleporters extend range and negate cost\ \Blocked by Temporal Soliton Shield (TSS)

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Chronoport to a specified point in time\if in range of a Chronoporter or Slipgate \ \Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires Gate Tech\ upgrade at your TELEPORTER

Objective.Name: Lay Caltrop Mine
Objective.Details: Plant mine at location\ \Temporarily cloaked static weapon platform\Detectes other cloaked units\Attacks with limited Ammo

ObjectClass.Name: Lancer
ObjectClass.Description: LANCER: Light scout and resource harasser aircraft Fast, lightly armored raider Can drop Caltrop Mines, or fire HE Ammo Splash damage weapon
